title: Dwaraka Tirumala
text:
Dwaraka Tirumala is a <a href="census%20town">census town</a> in <a href="West%20Godavari%20district">West Godavari district</a> of the <a href="India">India</a>n state of <a href="Andhra%20Pradesh">Andhra Pradesh</a>. It is located in <a href="Dwaraka%20Tirumala%20mandal">Dwaraka Tirumala mandal</a> of <a href="Eluru%20revenue%20division">Eluru revenue division</a>. The <a href="Venkateswara_Temple%2C_Dwaraka_Tirumala">Venkateswara Temple</a> is a pilgrimage center for <a href="hindus">hindus</a>, which is the abode of <a href="Venkateswara%20Temple%2C%20Dwaraka%20Tirumala">Lord Venkateswara</a>. This is often referred by the locals as "Chinna Tirupati", meaning mini <a href="Tirupati">Tirupati</a>.
Transport.
<a href="APSRTC">APSRTC</a> operates buses from <a href="Eluru">Eluru</a>, <a href="Rajamahendravaram">Rajamahendravaram</a>, <a href="Tadepalligudem">Tadepalligudem</a>, <a href="Vijayawada">Vijayawada</a>, <a href="Chintalapudi%2C%20West%20Godavari%20district">Chintalapudi</a>, <a href="Jangareddygudem">Jangareddygudem</a>, <a href="Bhimadole">Bhimadole</a>, <a href="Hyderabad">Hyderabad</a> and Tadepalligudem, Bhadrachalam to Dwarakatirumala bus station.
